testcase.name: Create an event on Calendar
testcase.system-out: Given I logged in as an Event manager.......................................passed When I navigate to Calendar module..........................................passed Then the page title should be "Meetings - Odoo".............................passed Given I am on Calendar page.................................................passed When I click on any date on Calendar........................................passed Then Create window should display...........................................passed And I write "event" and click on create.....................................passed Then new event should be displayed on Calendar page.........................passed

testcase.name: Delete a created event
testcase.system-out: Given I logged in as an Event manager.......................................passed When I navigate to Calendar module..........................................passed Then the page title should be "Meetings - Odoo".............................passed Given I am on Calendar page.................................................passed When I clicked on created event.............................................passed Then Create window should display...........................................passed And I click on delete.......................................................passed Then event should be dissapear from Calendar................................passed
